name: WidgetPack Comment System
author: WidgetPack

sections.description:
WidgetPack is a Real-time comments service for makes commenting easier and help to boost your search traffic.
More information https://widgetpack.com/comment-system

WidgetPack for WordPress

  • It’s free!
  • All comments are stored in default WordPress comment system
  • Comments indexable by all search engines (SEO)
  • Support schema.org/Comment microformat for fast indexable
  • Import/Export of existing comments to WidgetPack
  • Auto-sync of comments with WidgetPack and WordPress database
  • Comment count

WidgetPack Features

  • Star Rating
  • Google Rich Snippets for Rating
  • Guest and Social login
  • Real-time comments, replies, votes
  • Threaded comments and replies
  • Voting for comments
  • Email Notifications
  • SoundCloud, Twitter, YouTube and Vimeo embedding
  • Uploading images (gif, png, jpg)
  • Real-time and powerful admin tools
  • Built-in protection against spam
  • Spam protection with Google reCAPTCHA 2.0
  • Moderator roles
  • User ban, IP ban
  • Group operations
  • SSL

WidgetPack Pro Features

  • Single sign-on (SSO)
  • White-Label
  • API

Support

  • Chat support https://widgetpack.com/forum

  • Email support contact@widgetpack.com
sections.installation:
NOTE: It is recommended that you backup your database before installing the plugin.

  1. Unpack archive to this archive to the ‘wp-content/plugins/’ directory inside of WordPress
  • Maintain the directory structure of the archive (all extracted files
    should exist in ‘wp-content/plugins/widgetpack-comment-system/’
  1. From your blog administration, click on Comments to change settings
sections.changelog:
1.6.1

  • Bugfix: remove round for created field from the export

1.6

  • Test plugin to support with WordPress 4.7

1.54

  • Test plugin to support with WordPress 4.6

1.53

  • Change resource static server

1.52

  • Added Single sign-on (SSO) with login button

1.51

  • Bugfix: added slash escaping in json encode

1.5

  • Change version in constant

1.4

  • Fixes a wrong release tag

1.3

  • Bugfix: added json escape in comments export
  • Bugfix: get correct avatar for user in comments export

1.2

  • Fixes a wrong release tag

1.1

  • Fixes a bug where the new comment don’t sync
  • Naming refactoring
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

NOTE: It is recommended that you backup your database before installing the plugin.

  1. Unpack archive to this archive to the ‘wp-content/plugins/’ directory inside of WordPress
  • Maintain the directory structure of the archive (all extracted files
    should exist in ‘wp-content/plugins/widgetpack-comment-system/’
  1. From your blog administration, click on Comments to change settings

short_description: The WidgetPack Comment System replaces default WordPress comments with Ajax and Social comments service to drive more traffic for your site.
